title: High Ping
body:
High Ping at malaysia..any idea how to fix it?
i like to play at oce server..please help!!

replies.body: Btw oreo could you let me know after it fix done ?
I already send before but still the same..so i just need to wait underwater cable fix.anyway thanks oreo :)

If you are having high pings from Asian region (I feel you). However sometimes it's not Riot's server fault.
Underwater cables that connect us to the internet do break down and while we wait for repair works to be done (may take awhile), our data is re-routed to other countries before they reach Riot servers in Australia. 

I found this rather old link (http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs) which allows us to do some diagnostics test and send them to Riot to verify the connections. 

All fingers crossed that they do read the data and act on it.
Are you serious ... play the Garena server and don't play on the oce server.
